meanings: work as far as one can
press[jam] the accelerator to the floor
ram one's foot down on the accelerator
pull sth with all one's strength[might]

vlive.korean: [200214 있는 힘껏 겨드랑이 치던 형원...] 이렇게 쳐요? [Hyungwon hit his armpits as hard as he could] Hit like this? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MONSTA X] 턱선조심‼️ 거기에 베여서 평생 몬엑한테 배여들었잖아요 (I.M&KIHYUN talking about their face&exercise)
vlive.english: [Hyungwon hit his armpits as hard as he could] Hit like this?

vlive.korean: [손가락 있는 힘껏 펴기 허용!] 손가락 펴도 돼요? [You can stretch out your fingers!] Can I stretch out my fingers? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.92
vlive.english: [You can stretch out your fingers!] Can I stretch out my fingers?

vlive.korean: [정답을 향해 힘껏 소리 질러] 875! [Shouting out the answers on the top of their lungs] 875! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.84
vlive.english: [Shouting out the answers on the top of their lungs] 875!

vlive.korean: [액정 안으로 힘껏 손을 넣어본다] 내 손으로 할게요? [The other hand goes into the screen] Let me do it by myself. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 드라마짱팬 균이와 함께하는 K-DRAMA 완벽 마스터 "이 안에 너 있다.." (Hwi Young talking about K-Drama)
vlive.english: [The other hand goes into the screen] Let me do it by myself.
